statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.RequestType , AA.RequestDate , AA.Status , AA.RequestText , AA.ReturnText
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestType = #RequestType#
AND AA.RequestDate > DATEADD(DAY, -1, #StartRequestDate#)
AND AA.RequestDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndRequestDate#)
AND ( AA.RequestText LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR AA.ReturnText LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsRequest ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, RequestType, RequestDate, Status, RequestText, ReturnText ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #RequestType#, #RequestDate#, #Status#, #RequestText#, #ReturnText# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsRequest SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, RequestType = #RequestType# , RequestDate = #RequestDate# , Status = #Status# , RequestText = #RequestText# , ReturnText = #ReturnText# WHERE ID = #ID#
